name: Dragon Army Dragonnel
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The dragonnel doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragonnel makes two Rend attacks.

action.name: Rend
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.
